name: LootQuest: The Quest for Loot!
description:
WEB BUILD PLAYERS - Please play in fullscreen for the intended experience, and click the link at the top of the questionnaire to properly access to it  (Unity won't let you scroll!)

You're a greedy pirate on a quest for coins and gems - run, jump and body-swap through five levels to get super duper rich!

This platformer was made for my dissertation - please play it as you normally would, then fill out the questionnaire about your thoughts when you're done! Cheers!

Note - Replaying a level will reset your collectible progress for that level! Sorry!

If the game lags or is slow to load, consider downloading the 'LootQuest Downloadable Build' below.

Credits
  • Artwork - Treasure Hunters
  • Sounds and music - ZapSplat.com
  • Programming, level design, most other stuff - Kieron West

If you're looking for the hidden captain, search the UI.
